component.name: SectionIntro
component.title: A new world is born
component.text: Your journey in the metaverse begins now

component.name: SectionText
component.title: Open your eyes
component.text:
Explore an extraordinary and vast universe, home to wonderful environments and mysterious creatures

Where will you begin your journey?

slides.title: Kharan
slides.text: Flying dragon Celestial creature, Kharan is one of the few flying creatures in Meta Life. It features a natural celestial shield of protection, and is capable of casting heavy magical spells to annihilate enemies.

slides.title: Domenox
slides.text: A high speed Matrix Angel creature, AI-programed to being capable of jumping to high distances and surprise enemies. Domenox also is quite a resistant creature but its sensitive areas are at mercy.

slides.title: Ariox
slides.text: Ariox is an Insectoid Matrix Angel creature capable of moving at high-speed in multiple directions. It has the ability to track, sense and capture enemies thanks to its internal AI hunting system programmed to deploying a net of projectiles, trapping its target. Despite its resistant shell, Ariox still remains an easy target.

slides.title: Pronghar
slides.text: Pronghar is a high-velocity Roboter creature, often referred to as “The Proud One”. It has the stance of a royal creature, descended from divinities, and sights of a predator. It is highly agile, fast and wares off its adversaries at great speed.

slides.title: Astralis
slides.text: Magically suspended in the sky, Astralis is the capital city of the noble Celestials, the most prestigious race in Meta Life.

slides.title: Astralis
slides.text: Home to clear lakes, stylized buildings and hyper-modern architectural spaces, Astralis never stops charming both visitors and locals.

slides.title: Astralis
slides.text: Filled with bazzling godly monuments, it owes its name to the divinities that have made it a magical city among the clouds.

slides.title: The Celestial Stones
slides.text: Astralis features the most amazing landscapes, dominated by sacred monuments: The Celestial Stones, home of beautiful spirits and receptacle of intelligence.

slides.title: The Celestial Stones
slides.text: Its formidable powers allow for divine benedictions of all Celestials owing allegiance.

slides.title: The Celestial Stones
slides.text: Celestial Stones may be found at various locations within and without of Astralis and other Celestial cities. They vary in shape, power and size.

slides.title: Aurora, the Golden City
slides.text: Aurora - derived from ‘aurous’ meaning ‘gold/golden’ - is a city of wealth and high influence, Capital of the rich Goldbois.

slides.title: Aurora
slides.text: Its excentric architecture is said to have been whispered by divinities and built in only a day, so the legend says.

slides.title: Aurora
slides.text: Aurora is home to the craziest financial and intellectual abundances, and its population is known for its high-society lifestyle.

slides.title: Barad-Mörr
slides.text: Capital city of the Burners, Barad-Môrr is a place of fire and vileness. Heat and melt prevail as its brilliant population is obsessed with forging.

slides.title: Barad-Mörr
slides.text: Filled with dust, smoke and a barely breathable atmosphere, Barad-Mörr is a place that most avoid. Its demographic inequalities have plunged elites to prosper, and the poor to survive.

slides.title: Barad-Mörr
slides.text: The Burners’ capital is a vast, highly populated megalopolis that extends on hundreds of miles. Despite its size, its population still lives in heavily packed neighborhoods.

slides.title: C-111
slides.text: Capital of the Roboters, Capital 111 or often referred to as C-111 is a reflection of neo-dystopian architecture. Named after the number of survivors that initially built it, it is home to an incredible cyberpunk feeling.

slides.title: C-111
slides.text: With tech noir elements of decor, neon lights and a dark ambiance, C-111 presents technology as a force that threatens our perceptions of reality.

slides.title: Roboters Garage
slides.text: Within Capital 111 can be found numerous high-end technology workshops with baffling wonders of Roboters engineering. Powered with cutting-edge AI, robotic creatures are then used for defense of the city.

slides.title: Neopolis
slides.text: From above, Neopolis is a wonderful city of modernity and breathtaking architecture. Home of the Matrix Angels, its hyper-modern buildings are filled with new technologies.

slides.title: Neopolis
slides.text: But Neopolis is also home to mysterious alleys, and neighborhoods aren’t always safe to cruise in. The City of Hackers - as some may call it - can sometimes be dangerous.

slides.title: Neopolis
slides.text: Naturally gifted with immense knowledge in computer engineering, Neopolis is home to the most amazing robotics, hi-tech cybernetics and industrial sciences progress.

slides.title: New Heaven
slides.text: New Heaven is home to the Cybers, a race of brilliant beings who found success in the metaverse after the end of the world we know.

slides.title: New Heaven
slides.text: It connects rivers and seas through a magnificent and modern coastline of modern tech-filled skyscrapers.

slides.title: New Heaven
slides.text: Its futuristic buildings and glass-windowed buildings make up for its reputation: a place of light and revival.

slides.title: New Heaven
slides.text: New Heaven was named after its purpose, to provide a new place for the brilliant Cybers to thrive and escape from the world into the metaverse, paradise found.

slides.title: New Heaven
slides.text: The Cybers may now discover and research a new way of life, open to the world with globalized and outwards-looking businesses. A flourishing city of hope.

slides.title: Rust
slides.text: Known ofr its survival-of-the-fittest living conditions, Rust is where the Roughs call home. Despite its recent technology outreach, Rust was named after what is most common to see: its rusty buildings.

slides.title: Rust
slides.text: Dusty, iron-sighted, dystopian and deserted, Rust is prone to constant civilian anarchy. A reflection of the old world, in the metaverse.

slides.title: Rust
slides.text: But groups of survivors make the best out of what they can, and their recent technological progress creates hope. Once again.

slides.title: The Swamps
slides.text: A dangerous area of wild creatures. Once a place of worship for divinities, but nature has reclaimed its territory and made it hard to navigate. Swamps, animals, magical plants, wild vegetation and ancient monuments. But a place of many ressources and treasures for whom will dare to explore.

slides.title: The Wildlings
slides.text: An unspoiled land of jungle, lakes, rivers, waterfalls and wild animals near Astralis. Ready to be explored by bold and fearless adventurers looking to find exceptional resources at risk of coming across dangerous creatures.

component.name: SectionText
component.title: Your new life
component.text:
Own pieces of land to use their ressources. Build your new home in the metaverse to settle in Meta Life.

Meet new friends, attend events, host parties. Have fun in Meta life’s rich social life.

slides.title: The Swamps
slides.text: A dangerous area of wild creatures. Once a place of worship for divinities, but nature has reclaimed its territory and made it hard to navigate. Swamps, animals, magical plants, wild vegetation and ancient monuments. But a place of many ressources and treasures for whom will dare to explore.

slides.title: Matrix Angel Villa
slides.text: A comfortable home, with built-in new technologies and AI-powered systems allowing optimal automation of the house. Matrix Angel residences have their own AI assistant, integrated at purchase: Meyna.

slides.title: Goldboi Palace
slides.text: Goldbois houses are home to the most luxuriant pieces of furniture and decorations, with vibrant crystals, shiny materials and omnipresent gildings. The tainted glass windows, doors and walls bring in natural light, remindful of cathedrals.

slides.title: Burner Pool Mansion
slides.text: Mansions form Burners are brilliant architectural creations with edgy curves and series of floors allowing for amazing views and great overall comfort. They are also known for their futuristic platforms, allowing for flying vehicles to land seamlessly.

slides.title: Roboter Pool Villa
slides.text: Roboters Villas are known for their futuristic looks, with vibrant neon lights dominating over architectural creativities. With overflowing swimming pools, these houses allow for maximum leisure while providing its owner with great technologies.

slides.title: Rough Favela House
slides.text: The Rough’s Favela Houses are more often than not steel-made constructions with a dominating use of metal sheets, retrieved objects and wobbly pieces of furniture. Despite their rustic looks, Rough homes are comfortable, cosy and welcoming.

slides.title: Celestial Mansion
slides.text: Celestial Mansions are among the most expensive, luxurious and high-end houses in Meta Life. Providing their owners with incredibly unique architecture, bazzling swimming pools and immense parking spaces. An ideal purchase for those who can afford it.

component.name: SectionText
component.title: Experience the metaverse
component.text:
Gear up with weapons, travel the marvelous map of Meta Life on a motorbike or purchase a shiny new armor set.

Buy, sell, stake or lend your assets to other players. The possibilities are endless.

slides.title: LS-12
slides.text: The LS-12 - short for Light Sniper of 12th Generation - is a Burner-crafted heavy rifle loaded with Fire Ammunition. Despite its looks, this brilliant product of Burner engineering is quite light but its reach is not optimal. An ideal pick for heavy damage, at close and medium distances.

slides.title: Winger Heavy Rifle
slides.text: Often referred to as WHR or simply Winger, and named after its Celestial roots, the Winger is a very heavy sniper rifle with long-distance accuracy and excellent stability, at the expense of agility and speed. It is a rare piece, owned by very few and used by even less.

slides.title: SCAB-C
slides.text: The Scab-C SMG is a great choice for medium to long-distance auto shooting. It is precise, light and exquisitely beautiful. A pure product of Celestial engineering, the SCAB-C is a prestigious weapon often given as reward to the bravest.

slides.title: M1015
slides.text: The M1015 was created by Cybers looking for a close-range combat weapon capable of being as light as powerful at short distances. Its heavy ammo and slick design make it an ideal companion for pure enemy annihilation.

slides.title: Xondor ZERO-11
slides.text: The Xondor ZERO-11 is a Cyber electric motorcycle. Known for its ‘fastest terrain vehicle in Meta Life’ reputation, it includes a speeder boost with nitro and 21-inch wheels made for velocity. A brilliant piece of technology.

slides.title: Buggy Jumper
slides.text: The four-wheel ‘Fast Escape’ Rough vehicle is the lightest of all four-wheel vehicles. Its strong engine makes accelerating an easy task, and its impressive tires allow make deserts and rocky environments look easy to cruise.

slides.title: Alerion
slides.text: The Alerion armor set brings a versatile, balanced and devastatingly efficient upgrade to the Cyber base kit. Equipped, this tactical masterpiece lets you own the battlefield.

slides.title: Eludhel
slides.text: Evasive medium-weight Matrix Angel armor set used to diverge direct attacks, move lightly and take opponents by surprise. Stealth and durability, combined.

slides.title: Hermes’ Wrath
slides.text: This Roboter-crafted armour set is tailored to suit ruthless, deadly fights. It is durable and meant for an agile type of experience.

slides.title: SkySuit
slides.text: The Cyber SkySuit is a brilliant piece of aggregated new technologies with intelligent back and front armored protections reacting to strong impacts. Usually used to deal with high levels of atmospheric pressure.

component.name: SectionText
component.title: Your new economy
component.text:
Meta Life is powered by $METAL, its dual economy token.

Earn xMETAL by staking assets, selling on the marketplace and lending to other players. Swap it for ETH anytime.

Swap xMETAL for METAL - our governance token - to participe in the Meta Life DAO and help shape the future of your metaverse.

component.name: SectionHeading
component.title: Join us now
component.text: Meta Life will be available soon. Discover the latest news on our social accounts.
